-- | Binding to the SMPEG library
--   
--   Binding to the SMPEG library
@package SDL-mpeg
@version 0.0.1

module Graphics.UI.SDL.MPEG.Types
newtype MutexStruct
MkMutexStruct :: () -> MutexStruct
type Mutex = ForeignPtr MutexStruct
newtype MPEGStruct
MkMPEGStruct :: () -> MPEGStruct
type MPEG = ForeignPtr MPEGStruct
newtype InfoStruct
MkInfoStruct :: () -> InfoStruct
type Info = ForeignPtr InfoStruct
newtype FilterStruct
MkFilterStruct :: () -> FilterStruct
type Filter = ForeignPtr FilterStruct
newtype AudioSpecStruct
MkAudioSpecStruct :: () -> AudioSpecStruct
type AudioSpec = ForeignPtr AudioSpecStruct
type DisplayCallback = Ptr SurfaceStruct -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> IO ()
data Status
SMPEG_ERROR :: Status
SMPEG_STOPPED :: Status
SMPEG_PLAYING :: Status
instance Eq Status
instance Ord Status
instance Bounded Status
instance Enum Status

module Graphics.UI.SDL.MPEG.General
mkFinalizedMPEG :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> IO MPEG
_SMPEG_delete :: FunPtr (Ptr MPEGStruct -> IO ())
_SMPEG_new :: CString -> (Ptr InfoStruct) -> Int -> IO (Ptr MPEGStruct)
_SMPEG_new_descr :: Int -> (Ptr InfoStruct) -> Int -> IO (Ptr MPEGStruct)
_SMPEG_new_data :: Ptr () -> Int -> (Ptr InfoStruct) -> Int -> IO (Ptr MPEGStruct)
_SMPEG_new_rwops :: Ptr RWopsStruct -> (Ptr InfoStruct) -> Int -> IO (Ptr MPEGStruct)
_SMPEG_renderFrame :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> Int -> IO ()
_SMPEG_play :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> IO ()
_SMPEG_pause :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> IO ()
_SMPEG_stop :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> IO ()
_SMPEG_rewind :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> IO ()
_SMPEG_setdisplay :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> (Ptr SurfaceStruct) -> (Ptr MutexStruct) -> FunPtr DisplayCallback -> IO ()
_SMPEG_setdisplayregion :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> IO ()
_SMPEG_move :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> Int -> Int -> IO ()
mkDisplayCallback :: DisplayCallback -> IO (FunPtr DisplayCallback)
_SMPEG_getinfo :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> Ptr InfoStruct -> IO ()
_SMPEG_enableaudio :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> Int -> IO ()
_SMPEG_enablevideo :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> Int -> IO ()
_SMPEG_status :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> IO Int
_SMPEG_setvolume :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> Int -> IO ()
_SMPEG_loop :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> Int -> IO ()
_SMPEG_scaleXY :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> Int -> Int -> IO ()

_SMPEG_seek :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> Int -> IO ()
_SMPEG_skip :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> Float -> IO ()

_SMPEG_error :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> IO CString
_SMPEG_playAudio :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> CString -> Int -> IO Int
_SMPEG_playAudioSDL :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> CString -> Int -> IO ()

_SMPEG_actualSpec :: Ptr MPEGStruct -> Ptr AudioSpecStruct -> IO ()

module Graphics.UI.SDL.MPEG

-- | Create a new MPEG object from an MPEG file.
load :: FilePath -> IO MPEG

-- | Create a new MPEG object from a file descriptor.
loadFd :: Int -> IO MPEG

-- | Create a new MPEG object from a byte string.
loadData :: CStringLen -> IO MPEG

-- | Create a new MPEG object from a RWops structure.
loadRWops :: RWops -> IO MPEG

-- | Set the SDL surface and the position the MPEG object is to be painted
--   on.
setSurface :: MPEG -> Surface -> Int -> Int -> IO ()

-- | Set the region of the video to be shown.
setDisplayRegion :: MPEG -> Rect -> IO ()

-- | Render a particular frame in the MPEG video
renderFrame :: MPEG -> Int -> IO ()
setScale :: MPEG -> Int -> IO ()
setScaleXY :: MPEG -> Int -> Int -> IO ()
enableVideo :: MPEG -> Bool -> IO ()
enableLoop :: MPEG -> Bool -> IO ()
enableAudio :: MPEG -> Bool -> IO ()
pause :: MPEG -> IO ()
stop :: MPEG -> IO ()
rewind :: MPEG -> IO ()
play :: MPEG -> IO ()
